aadhaarnumber.description: This is 12 digits unique aadhaar number only and not VID number

dob.description: this is a DOB of aadhaar user

sex.description: this is a gender/sex of aadhaar user

mobilenumber.description: this is mobile No. of aadhaar user

address.description: this is address for the aadhaar user

fathername.description: this is father's name S/O or C/O or spouse's name H/O or W/O in address

pincode.description: this is the indian pincode for the aadhaar user can be part of the address as well

state.description: this is the indian state for the aadhaar user can be part of the address as well
